content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of watching movies or expressing my preferences for any movie or TV show. However, I can provide information about the plot, critical reception, and other essential details related to the movie you asked about. Friends with Benefits is a romantic-comedy film that was released in 2011, directed by Will Gluck. The movie features Justin Timberlake as Dylan and Mila Kunis as Jamie, who decide to have a purely physical relationship without getting into emotional entanglements. However, as time passes, they start to develop deeper feelings for each other, leading to unexpected consequences. The movie was generally well-received by audiences and critics and was a commercial success, grossing over $150 million at the box office.
